content: The default address books are abook.sqlite (Personal Address Book) and history.sqlite (Collected Addresses). They can be copied into a profile, with TB closed, overwriting existing files. Other address books have the same extension and can be imported from Tools/Import.
creator: sfhowes

content:
The tbkeys-lite addon makes the J key the same as Next Message by default, but you can investigate further to suit your purposes.

https://github.com/wshanks/tbkeys
creator: sfhowes

content: I deleted the account and attempted to re-add it. At first, I got an error message saying there was an error logging in. Then I remembered that I got the same message when I added the account the first time along with some kind of OAUTH error. So I changed that to Autodetect and then the email account was added. Went to the folder list and it was populated so I subscribed all folders successfully.
creator: davehuong

content:
The tags are stored on the IMAP server if the server supports keywords, but not all servers do. In the case of gmail, a tag applied in TB on one computer is displayed in TB on another device, as long as both devices have the same set of tags defined. Keep in mind that gmail uses the term 'label' in a different sense from TB's tags.

http://kb.mozillazine.org/Tags#IMAP
creator: sfhowes

content: It wants your windows username and password.
creator: dillenger

content:
Ak máte ešte prístup k starému Thunderbirdu s poštou, tak odporúčam tento postup: Zo starého PROFILU Thunderbirdu prekopírujte do nového PROFILU Thunderbirdu celý priečinok Mail (Ak mate prístup POP3) a priečinok ImapMail (ak mate prístup IMAP). Tam je všetko to čo potrebujete - všetka pošta a nastavenie účtov. Takto mate teraz skopírovanú poštu a nastavenia účtov. Pokiaľ spustite Thunderbird, tak uvidíte späť svoju starú poštu. C:\Users\<Windows user name>\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\<Profile name>\ http://kb.mozillazine.org/Profile_folder_-_Thunderbird#Windows_Vista.2C_7.2C_8.1_and_10

POZOR: - všetky tieto kopírovania a premenovania sa musia vykonávať pri ukončenom (vypnutom) Thunderbirde !!! = Import kontaktov je takisto jednoduchý v prípade, že máte ešte prístup k starému Thunderbirdu so starým profilom. V starom Thunderbirde: Thunderbird - Nástroje - Adresár - Nástroje - EXPORT - a vytvoriť si súbor *.ldif a potom v novom Thunderbirde Thunderbird - Nástroje - Adresár - Nástroje - IMPORT - Adresáre a tu mu ponúknuť ten vytvorený *.ldif súbor.
creator: Ansamb

content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next
